name: Genehtik
overview: You are the GENEHTIK PIGGY pig and how every day you like to wear green, red or yellow and for this you must plant your harvest if what you want is to go home to hit a smoke with your colleagues. Or not?... Fed up with so much "friend of others" you decide to mount an InDoor half with your colleague Inguil, between so much hustle here and there, assembly and optimization your friend Inguil who is all caught He has gone home ... having previously lost the seed of kritikal and the key to the door of the Indoor ..... upsss ... Damn chestnut pilonga ... , you think as you kick a stone lamenting and decide to fix the mess, ... as always ... Well, neither short nor lazy you set out and prepare to face the innumerable dangers that stalk you along the way. You know Piggy collects your seed and the key, he returns to your indoor and connects it. So get to work and help our pig Piggi to complete his mission successfully. and thus to be able to meet with his colleagues in the neighborhood and be able to get some petas more agusto than a bush.
